TITLE: Are Calcium Supplements Safe?
SUMMARY: Kidney stones are a known risk, but studies have investigated other potential safety concerns, including an increased risk of death, cancer and heart disease.

TITLE: Is Alkaline Water Really Better for You?
SUMMARY: What’s behind the claims that alkaline water will “energize” and “detoxify” the body and lead to “superior hydration”?

TITLE: How Can Oats, Which Don’t Contain Gluten, Be Labeled ‘Gluten Free’?
SUMMARY: Oats, water, even sneakers may be advertised as “gluten-free.”
